name: IMPORTS_CONTROL_PERMIT
description: Control of imports. Application for an import permit.

fields.tooltip: Enter Company Name  Eg Doe Industries (pty) ltd
Enter Company Registration Number Eg BW00001234567
Enter Postal Address Eg Private Bag 99 Gaborone

fields.description: Enter Applicant's Position/Status to the Business
fields.tooltip: Enter Applicant's Position/status to the Buisness Eg Intern/Ceo

fields.tooltip: Select Country Impoerting Goods From Eg Albania

fields.groupLabel: Add a list of Imported Goods

groupFields.tooltip: Description of item to be imported Eg textiles

groupFields.description: Enter Quantity(i.e. kg/units) of Goods to be imported
groupFields.tooltip: Enter Quantity(i.e. kg/units) of Goods to be imported

groupFields.description: Enter Unit Price of goods to be imported
groupFields.tooltip: Enter Unit Price of goods to be imported Eg BWP 200

groupFields.description: Enter Total amounts of goods to be imported
groupFields.tooltip: Enter Total amounts of goods to be imported Eg BWP 20,000

groupFields.description: Enter Name of Supplier of Goods to be imported
groupFields.tooltip: Enter Name of Supplier of Goods to be imported Eg Textiles Inc
Enter Postal Address of Supplier Eg 1500 District of Krujë

groupFields.description: Enter Purpose of goods to be imported
groupFields.hint: eg. Goods will be used for manufacturing purposes
groupFields.tooltip: Purpose for item 1 is required (e.g. trade or manufacturing or other purposes)
